name: Continue? Bingo
description:
Are you a fan of Continue?

Then you should try playing Continue Bingo. When one of the show's tropes happens click on the corresponding button. Get 5 in a line and BINGO!

The bingo cards are randomly generated every time you load the game, so you can play with every episode.

This is a fan made game.

It is completely free.

*Update*

Now with a button to add new cards.
